summary: WHILE TRAVELING AT SLOW SPEEDS, (LESS THAN 15 MPH) BRAKE PEDAL PULSES, AND GOES TOWARDS THE FLOOR. ABS THEN ACTIVATES, AND THE TRUCK DOES NOT STOP. THIS HAS HAPPENED 5-10 TIMES, TWICE CAUSING COLLISIONS WITH CURBS, AND PARKING BARRIERS. GARAGE THAT FIXED A BROKEN BRAKE LINE, CHECKED THE BRAKES, AND COULD FIND NO PROBLEMS. *JB
